bWireframe: Toggle visibility of all mesh edges
bBoundaryEdges: Toggle visibility of open boundary edges
bUVSeams: Toggle visibility of UV seam edges
bUVBowties: Toggle visibility of UV bowtie vertices
bMissingUVs: Toggle visibility of triangles with missing UVs
bNormalSeams: Toggle visibility of Normal seam edges
bTangentSeams: Toggle visibility of Tangent seam edges
bDrawHiddenEdgesAndSeams: Toggle visibility of occluded boundary edges and seams
NormalLength: Length of line segments representing normal vectors
TangentLength: Length of line segments representing tangent vectors
ShowIndices: Draw the mesh indices of the selected type. A maximum of 500 visible indices will be rendered.
